Exit can be closed: set 4-Closed and 6-Closable together

Must be flying to see/go to this exit

May only go through during the day

Monsters.Flag: Monster was hidden before and will rehide again
If the player is in good standing with the monster, the monster will not passively guard exits
Monster will prevent player from getting treasure
Monster will prevent player from leaving the room (excluding flee) during combat
Monster will follow a player who walks out of the room during combat
Monster will randomly get items from the ground
Monster cannot be peeked and cannot be stolen from
Monster can only be harmed by magic
Monster will assist members of primeFaction
Player needs +1 weapon or better to be hit
Monster uses old talk system (DONT SET)
Monster has a fixed amount of gold
Can riposte regardless of other rules
Monster is carrying a darkness item
Players can purchase items from this monster
Players can trade items with this monster
Monster passively prevents players from going through an exit (exit needs flag 19-PassiveGuard)
Monster has additon description after death (requires special file)
Monster will follow DM (DONT SET - used for possessing)
Monster will wander around the area
Monster will try to take players' loot
Monster will quickly wander around the area
Player needs +2 weapon or better to be hit
Player needs +3 weapon or better to be hit
Monster will steal from players during combat
Monster will be assisted by any monster with 101-WillAssist (DONT SET - use assist fields)
Monster will assist any monster with 100-Assisted (DONT SET - use assist fields)

Monster will wield weapons in their inventory
Monster will only come during the day
Monster resists circle - circled as if undead

Anything that happens to the monster will be logged until saved
Monster will sometimes steal cash instead of killing
Monster will sometimes knock the player unconscious and haul them off to jail
Monster can only be killed/attacked by someone less than maxLevel
Monster cannot be backstabbed - for really small creatures and stuff like slimes
Monster uneffected by level 2 spells or lower
Monster uneffected by level 3 spells or lower
Monster uneffected by level 4 spells or lower

Monster turned as 'special' undead -- harder to turn
Monster does not make player lose exp when they die

Monster ALWAYS aggressive, ignoring other rules that can override aggro
Monster attacks all mobs it will not assist

Monster is custom - has no specific mtype
Monster will not adjust on loading
Monster will remain on active list until killed
Monster is anti-magic - blocks magic in room
Monster has a negative life-draining aura
Monster has a turbulent wind aura

Player is allowed to remove items. Stock + Remove means the player can reprice items
